title: All Tied Up
description: It’s been almost two and a half years since Jack and Quinlan first met each other. After getting married in Greece and vacationing in Tokyo with their friends, they’re ready for some quality alone time. So Jack surprises Quinlan with a trip to the mountains for Christmas promising a cozy cabin, lots of snow, and plenty of holiday themed fun. Jump back into the world of Games We Play to check in on your favorite characters and see what kinky games they’re playing now.
author: Dana Isaly
